emojis.name: grinning face
emojis.description: A yellow face with simple, open eyes and a broad, open smile, showing upper teeth and tongue on some platforms.

emojis.name: party popper
emojis.description: A party popper, as would be used at a celebration. Depicted as a gold cone shooting out colorful confetti and streamers.

emojis.name: rainbow
emojis.description: A rainbow, as seen after rain. Depicted as an arch of multicolored stripes, generally showing six colors: red, orange, yellow, green, blue, and purple.

emojis.name: pizza
emojis.description: A slice of pepperoni pizza, with a red and yellow triangular slice with a browned crust.

emojis.name: dog face
emojis.description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a dog, looking straight ahead. Generally depicted as the face of a dog breed with floppy ears, such as a Golden Retriever or Beagle.

emojis.name: rocket
emojis.description: A rocket being launched into space. Generally depicted as a white or silver rocket ship with fins and fire shooting from its base.

emojis.name: red heart
emojis.description: A classic red love heart emoji, used for expressions of love and romance.

emojis.name: glowing star
emojis.description: A yellow or gold star with five points, surrounded by smaller sparkles or rays to give a glowing effect.

emojis.name: guitar
emojis.description: An acoustic or electric guitar. Depicted as a red or brown guitar in a right-handed orientation.

emojis.name: hamburger
emojis.description: A hamburger, consisting of a meat patty on a bun, usually garnished with lettuce, tomato, and cheese.

emojis.name: hibiscus
emojis.description: A pink or red hibiscus flower, often associated with tropical locations.

emojis.name: trophy
emojis.description: A golden trophy with a stem and handles, awarded for an achievement in sports or other competitive areas.

emojis.name: crescent moon
emojis.description: A crescent moon, as visible during its first or last quarter phase. Generally depicted in yellow or gold.

emojis.name: books
emojis.description: A stack of three colored, hardcover books.

emojis.name: butterfly
emojis.description: A butterfly, a beautiful winged insect. Generally depicted in blue and black, as a morpho butterfly or blue morpho.

emojis.name: performing arts
emojis.description: Two masks, one showing a happy face and the other a sad face, as used in Greek and Roman theater to represent comedy and tragedy.

emojis.name: water wave
emojis.description: A wave of water, as the sea or ocean. Depicted as a blue wave with white sea foam cresting over to the right.

emojis.name: soft ice cream
emojis.description: A swirl of soft-serve ice cream in a wafer cone. Generally depicted as vanilla ice cream.

emojis.name: balloon
emojis.description: A party balloon in red or another bright color.

emojis.name: elephant
emojis.description: A gray elephant, shown in full profile facing left with large ears and a long trunk.

emojis.name: high voltage
emojis.description: A jagged yellow lightning bolt or high voltage sign.

emojis.name: red apple
emojis.description: A classic red apple, as pictured on a teacher's desk or in a fruit bowl.

emojis.name: person surfing
emojis.description: A person riding a surfboard on a wave. Typically shown wearing swim trunks.

emojis.name: cactus
emojis.description: A cactus, a spiny plant that grows in very dry regions. Depicted as a saguaro cactus with two side arms.

emojis.name: artist palette
emojis.description: A palette used by an artist when painting, as to mix different colors. Generally depicted as a wooden palette with a hole for the thumb and paint colors around the edge.

emojis.name: thumbs up
emojis.description: A thumbs-up gesture indicating approval, agreement, or encouragement.

emojis.name: face with tears of joy
emojis.description: A yellow face with a big grin, uplifted eyebrows, and smiling eyes, each shedding a tear from laughing so hard.

emojis.name: smiling face with heart-eyes
emojis.description: A yellow face with an open smile, sometimes showing teeth, and red, cartoon-styled hearts for eyes.

emojis.name: thinking face
emojis.description: A yellow face with furrowed eyebrows looking upwards with thumb and index finger resting on its chin.

emojis.name: face with open mouth
emojis.description: A yellow face with raised eyebrows and an open mouth, as if gasping in shock or surprise.

emojis.name: clapping hands
emojis.description: Two hands clapping, as in applause or approval.

emojis.name: crying face
emojis.description: A yellow face with raised eyebrows and a slight frown, shedding a single, blue tear from one eye.

emojis.name: face with rolling eyes
emojis.description: A yellow face with slightly raised eyebrows, looking upwards and rolling its eyes.

emojis.name: smiling face with sunglasses
emojis.description: A yellow face with a broad, closed smile wearing black sunglasses, as if a pair of classic Wayfarers.

emojis.name: exploding head
emojis.description: A yellow face with an open mouth, the top of its head exploding in the shape of a brain-like mushroom cloud.
